captions.text:
- All right, so we're gonna
play--here's your paddle.
I'm sure you have one, but--

- Can we spank each other
with it?

- Yes, you can.
You can do whatever you want.

Okay, "Never have I ever
had phone sex."

someone else's toothbrush
without telling them."
in a bathroom during a party."

- These are--
- This is the 21st century.

- "Never have I ever
gotten kicked out of a bar."

"Never have I ever dated someone
and their sibling."
with someone else in the room."
with someone else in the room."

- Just wave your hands
in the air.

I mean, all these questions
are sexual.

"Never have I ever
forgotten the name

of the person
I was fooling around with."

You two are perfect
for each other.

- I feel like I'm getting
to know my new boyfriend.
- Wait, come up with a question,

and we'll answer it right now
in the spot.

with more than two different
people in one day.

- I mean, two different people
in a day, Madonna?

I want it to be special
for my wife.

- Aw. I don't buy that.
- I don't--

title: Never Have I Ever with Madonna and Justin Bieber
